events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's message mentions a refund request and incorrect item received, categorizing the case under Refund.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah L. for resolution and further assistance.
Hello, I'm Sarah from customer support. Iâ€™m here to help with your refund request for the wrong item received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to proceed with the refund?
My order number is 457821 and I have attached a photo showing the item I got, which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3 to 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and the refund update. I appreciate your help resolving this matter promptly.
The refund case has been resolved and the refund transaction was successfully initiated on our end.
We are checking in to ensure that you have received your refund and that everything has been resolved to your satisfaction.
Since we have not heard back and your refund has been processed, we are closing this support case. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
